name: rag-prototype
description: A RAG prototype using PostgreSQL + pgvector with FastMCP

scripts.test:connection: docker exec rag-postgres pg_isready -U raguser -d rag
scripts.test:db: docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=ragpassword rag-postgres psql -U raguser -d rag -c "SELECT 'Database ready!';"
scripts.test:config: node -e "import('./mcp/lib/config.js').then(m => { const config = m.ConfigManager.getRagConfig(); console.log('✅ Config loaded:', config); });"
scripts.test:system: node -e "import('./retriever/postgresql-retriever.js').then(m => { const retriever = new m.PostgreSQLRetriever(); retriever.initialize().then(() => console.log('✅ RAG System ready!')).catch(console.error); });"
